sections.name: Theme
lyrics: ***Intro***

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Today is gonna be the day
That they're gonna throw it back to you
By now you should've somehow
Realized what you gotta do
I don't believe that anybody
Feels the way I do, about you now

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Backbeat, the word was on the street
That the fire in your heart is out
I'm sure you've heard it all before
But you never really had a doubt
I don't believe that anybody
Feels the way I do about you now

sections.name: Pré refrain
lyrics: And all the roads we have to walk are winding
And all the lights that lead us there are blinding
There are many things that I
Would like to say to you but I don't know how

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: Because maybe, you're gonna be the one that saves me
And after all, you're my wonderwall

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Today was gonna be the day
But they'll never throw it back to you
By now you should've somehow
Realized what you're not to do
I don't believe that anybody
Feels the way I do, about you now

sections.name: Pré refrain
lyrics: And all the roads that lead you there are winding
And all the lights that light the way are blinding
There are many things that I
Would like to say to you but I don't know how

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: I said maybe, you're gonna be the one that saves me
And after all, you're my wonderwall

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: I said maybe, you're gonna be the one that saves me
And after all, you're my wonderwall
